price: They will say, “Now we believe in it,” but how could they attain faith from such a distant place[26],
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلتَّنَاوُشُ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ
footnotes: [26] For it is already too late to return to worldly life.
